Articles.Content:
the OP has a little vid of how it looks put together

also, haven't tested with the update, but in 0.19 I was actually landing sections verticaly and pulling them over with a KAS equipped rover...granted I only tried this on low-g planets/moons. Kinda pointless if theres an atmosphere since you can use parachutes or airship envelopes.

I am in the process of building vehicles for transporting modules as these to position as well as a crane to place them in the exact place you need them

I am in the process of building vehicles for transporting modules as these to position as well as a crane to place them in the exact place you need them

hahahaha amazing what you can get done with a rover with KAS grappling hook and a 'who cares if it breaks' attitude!

One of the best features of this kit is the built in docking system. Ive broke building as I landed em, but they can be snaped back together.

Share pics when ya get that done, would love to see it
The one without a ramp, the vertical one.

The one without a ramp, the vertical one.

It's designed to be at the end of a corridor, on the middle node We decided not to put those middle nodes on the four-way adaptor, since it would make 12 nodes on the same part, which is, in my opinion, too much.

I'll try to make a video about the mod, and an album of example made by Germalto should come...

Great thanks for the update.

I'm still struggling on how to build my base, I guess I'll have to keep practising.
here is a couple pics of the test station I made (also using FASA asteroids)
This mod was just update yesterday... Didn't he say in a previous post that the landing pad and command tower would be in this update? Said something about it being out on the 1st or 2nd.
I think he was referring to the 0.20+ update, I think the control tower and such are still WIP, though I must say Im rather eager to see that control tower myself.

here is a couple pics of the test station I made (also using FASA asteroids)

Would you mind giving me a link to these pictures, but BIGGER? So I can add them to the main post, if you're okay with it

sure gimme a sec, need to reupload em bigger...theres a bit of LLL parts too, just fyi

they are on imgur, what kinda link works best for ya bud??

PMed new links to Ravski

Edited June 3, 2013 by KhaosCorp
imgur is fine, you just have those pictures super small.

Having a bit of an issue now im using this kit for an asteroid base.....

How would it be to make a 2nd version of the 4way connector with the attachment nodes rotated? This way the direction your building can be changed.

Having a bit of an issue now im using this kit for an asteroid base.....

How would it be to make a 2nd version of the 4way connector with the attachment nodes rotated? This way the direction your building can be changed.

Or......

if it could be made to attach both directions (horizontal and vertical) it would work better than reworked 4way....basically im trying to build up and down as well as out...hope im make sense to ya lol

EDIT:

maybe this will help explain what im talking about

I want to build down along the asteroid (would be useful/cool for planetary bases on low-g planets to ya)

Edited June 3, 2013 by KhaosCorp
pic
Need all the cool updates! do eet now!

Update

Leg animation is done, currently working on a lift to take kerbals up and down

Update

Looking awesome bud, cant wait to see the next release!

Ill have some more pics for ya shortly, trying to keep your stuff separate from others in my build so I can get some isolated pics for ya this time
Any plans on a hanger module?
This is so cool! I just need to figure out how to get it into space...

Any plans on a hanger module?

somewhat, The issue I've had with hangers is that I'm really not sure what size to make them. The one below is something i created quickly the other day, if i end up using it it will have the ablility to open the front door, which will double as a ramp, and the top will also open for VTOL craft's/bases in space/asteroid bases/whatever you use them for.

Feedback would be appreciated as I'm not sure on the design or the size of the structure.

somewhat, The issue I've had with hangers is that I'm really not sure what size to make them. The one below is something i created quickly the other day, if i end up using it it will have the ablility to open the front door, which will double as a ramp, and the top will also open for VTOL craft's/bases in space/asteroid bases/whatever you use them for.

Feedback would be appreciated as I'm not sure on the design or the size of the structure.

I think you could make multiple types of hangers with different sizes to suit differently sized bases and vehicles. That way no one would complain about it being too big or too small, they could just pick the one that suits their needs.

I like it! Kinda hard to tell the size like though. What scale is that grid overlay? Perfect for low-g if the top opens...everything is VTOL in zero-g =)

The next update has real potential for lots of crazy awesomeness it seems!

Thanks for this awesome mod, and your continued work, it is very much appreciated!!!1

I seem to be having some problems, when i reload a craft from the tracking station i keep getting i big list all in red in the debug menu and i assume that's bad. Sometimes it will cause my frame rate to die and other times it wont, but the big red list is there. I really have no idea what's happening but here is a screenshot;
that pic don't really help, cant see whats in debug log

I seem to be having some problems, when i reload a craft from the tracking station i keep getting i big list all in red in the debug menu and i assume that's bad. Sometimes it will cause my frame rate to die and other times it wont, but the big red list is there. I really have no idea what's happening but here is a screenshot;

Uh... I... am a bit speechless. I don't know what to say... But I think it's not due to our mod only, since it's only parts...
